Subject: Email Revision
Description: Just wanted to see if it was possible to revise the list of users that receive the Security Advisory and related emails? Is it possible that we can do that? Or is that something that needs to be taken care of on your end? At current the only users that need to be receiving Security advisories for the Florida Lottery are as follows: alberst@flalottery.com davisa@flalottery.com wertj@flalottery.com thomasj@flalottery.com sandsr@flalottery.com stovallm@flalottery.com
What_We_Know__c:
We asked the Sales dept to help us with this request.

The Sales dept confirmed via mail that the list of people to receive critical notifications has been forwarded to Marketing and this will a few weeks to update.

We have informed the customer about this update.
Next_Steps__c: We are waiting for the customer's feedback about our last reply.
